scripts.installDeps: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.upgradeDeps: npx npm-check-updates --upgrade && npx npm-check-updates --upgrade --packageFile frontend/package.json && npx npm-check-updates --upgrade --packageFile backend/package.json
scripts.cleanDeps: cd frontend && rimraf node_modules && cd ../backend && rimraf node_modules && cd .. && rimraf node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && cross-env FAST_REFRESH=true yarn start" "cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ZU_DEFAULT_USERNAME=admin ZU_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=zero-ui nodemon ./bin/www --ignore data/db.json"
scripts.build: cd frontend && cross-env INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false yarn build
scripts.prod: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ZU_SECURE_HEADERS=false yarn start
